description: Sadat, Anwar, 1918-1981 -- Photographs; Weizman, Ezer, 1924-2005 -- Photographs
label: On the 16th anniversary of the late Egyptian President Anwar Sadat's historic address to Israel's Knesset Members in Jerusalem, his niece and nephew this week visited Israel and were guests of honour at the President's residence in the very same city.
